Apple___Apple_scab.description: Apple scab is a fungal disease that affects apple trees, causing dark, scaly lesions on leaves and fruit.

Apple___Black_rot.description: Black rot is a fungal disease that causes fruit rot and canker formation on apple trees.

Apple___healthy.description: This apple tree appears to be healthy with no visible signs of disease.
prevention_tips: Monitor for early signs of disease

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial spot is a common disease affecting tomato plants, caused by Xanthomonas bacteria.

Tomato___Early_blight.description: Early blight is a fungal disease that affects tomato plants, causing leaf spots and fruit rot.
symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings on leaves
Yellowing and wilting of lower leaves
Fruit rot at the stem end
treatments: Use mulch to prevent soil splash

Tomato___healthy.description: This tomato plant appears to be healthy with no visible signs of disease.
prevention_tips: Monitor for early signs of disease

Corn___Common_rust.description: Common rust is a fungal disease that affects corn plants, causing orange pustules on leaves.
symptoms: Orange to brown pustules on leaves

Corn___healthy.description: This corn plant appears to be healthy with no visible signs of disease.
prevention_tips: Monitor for early signs of disease

Grape___Black_rot.description: Black rot is a fungal disease that affects grapevines, causing fruit rot and leaf spots.
symptoms: Brown spots on leaves with black borders

Grape___healthy.description: This grapevine appears to be healthy with no visible signs of disease.
prevention_tips: Monitor for early signs of disease

Potato___Early_blight.description: Early blight is a fungal disease that affects potato plants, causing leaf spots and tuber rot.
symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings on leaves
Yellowing and wilting of lower leaves

Potato___healthy.description: This potato plant appears to be healthy with no visible signs of disease.
prevention_tips: Monitor for early signs of disease
